name: Loading States & Skeleton UI
summary: Add loading indicators and skeleton screens for better perceived performance
description: Implement loading states that provide visual feedback during async operations, improving perceived performance and user experience.

scenarioTemplate.ticketDescription: The {component} currently shows nothing while data loads, making the app feel slow. Add {loadingType} to provide visual feedback during loading.
acceptanceCriteria: Skeleton UI appears immediately on page load
Skeleton matches the layout of actual content
Smooth transition from skeleton to content
technicalRequirements: Match skeleton dimensions to actual content
Handle loading state in data hooks

codeExercise.problemDescription: Create a skeleton component and use it while data loads.

blanks.hint: Check the loading state prop to decide what to render

codeExercise.successMessage: The skeleton provides visual feedback while content loads!

hints: Skeletons should match the size of the actual content
Use CSS animations for the shimmer effect
Consider using a library like react-loading-skeleton
